messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to a character if they fail a CON roll while receiving First Aid?
The character is dying and must make a CON roll per round thereafter to stave-off death.
You are a helpful assistant.
What skill can save the life of a dying character after First Aid?
A successful Medicine roll or being hospitalized.
You are a helpful assistant.
Is Administering First Aid to an alien being considered of Regular difficulty level?
Yes, it is always of Regular difficulty level.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can First Aid be continued indefinitely?
No, it can be continued without constituting a Pushed roll until stabilization or death.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is an important skill to have alongside Medicine to be an effective medic?
First Aid
You are a helpful assistant.
How does the difficulty level change when treating an unfamiliar alien being?
Higher
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the regular difficulty level for administering First Aid to a fellow human?
Regular difficulty level
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the consequence of an insane investigator failing a pushed roll?
Feels compelled to 'heal' the person, potentially leading to murder
You are a helpful assistant.
What skill enables an investigator to remember the significance of a country, city, region, or person?
History
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the difficulty level for administering First Aid to an alien being whose physiology is unfamiliar?
Higher
You are a helpful assistant.
What constitutes physical attacks in the context of the text?
In effect, their endeavors constitute physical attacks which may lead to murder if they are not stopped.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the opposing skill/difficulty level to recall some pertinent and useful information?
i Regular difficulty: to recall some pertinent and useful information.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if you fail a Pushed roll?

Sample Consequences of failing a Pushed roll: consultations alert your adversaries, who become aware of your intent; your facts are erroneous and lead you into danger; much time and money is wasted on fruitless research.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a successful roll in the context of the text?
A successful roll might be used to help identify tools, techniques, or ideas familiar to ancestors, but little known today.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if an investigator fails a pushed roll under hypnosis?
They are convinced they are displaced in time or living in a historic period.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the effect of hypnosis on a willing target?
They experience heightened suggestibility, relaxation, and possible recall of forgotten memories.
You are a helpful assistant.
How common is the Hypnosis ability?
It is Uncommon.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can the Hypnosis ability be used on unwilling targets?
This is decided by the Keeper to fit their game.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the skill used for?
hypnotherapy
You are a helpful assistant.
Who can determine the minimum number of hypnotherapy sessions needed to cure someone?
the Keeper
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum number of hypnotherapy sessions needed to cure someone of a phobia?
minimum of 1D6 sessions
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the opposition to hypnosis?
Psychology or POW
